content: what is  Nexus or similar: hdmi out?

Nexus is a brand of mobile devices developed by Google. In the context of HDMI out, Nexus devices typically refer to smartphones or tablets that offer the capability to connect and display content on external displays through HDMI (High-Definition Multimedia Interface) output.

HDMI out allows you to connect your Nexus device to a TV, monitor, or any other compatible display that has an HDMI input port. By doing so, you can mirror your device's screen or stream videos, photos, games, or any other content from your phone or tablet directly onto the larger screen.

Other smartphone or tablet brands may also offer similar HDMI out functionality, allowing users to connect their devices to external displays for improved multimedia experiences or presentations.
